page.title: 07 THE LEIGH 5
page.content: wall round it. A lot of people have extended kitchens and built bathrooms. {FARMING} Mr Freeman who lived on the edge of the village was growing cabbages, sprouts, onions, beetroot and carrots. The field behind his holding which he rented, had wheat growing in it. There were also some orchards on land sloping down to the meadows. Many of the farm people rarely leave the village except to go to market. One women who went to Cheltenham said that they had taken up the tramlines since she was last there.
